marketing: Someone to find events where we can showcase this signature project.

project_goal: Design and construct four robotic replicas of President Kaler's head, painted to look like marble busts, that sing in glorious 4-part harmony.
project_categories: ME, EE, Programming, Product Design, Marketing

project_leaders.name: John Phillips
project_leaders.desc: John is a chemical engineering major in his senior year at the University. Usually easy to spot with his rainbow propeller hat, John enjoys electronic music and anything goofy.
